subject: Automobile Racing
Motorcycles, Motor Bikes and Motorscooters
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A record 431 teams lined up for the 39th edition of the Baja 1000, 1,050 miles down the Baja Peninsula on horribly rutted dirt tracks miles from civilization.
snippet: A record 431 teams lined up for the 39th edition of the Baja 1000, 1,050 miles down the Baja Peninsula on horribly rutted dirt tracks miles from civilization.
